name: structFilter
description: Used to filter the key-value pairs in a structure.

params.name: structure
params.description: Name of the structure to filter

params.name: function
params.description: Inline function/closure executed for each key in the structure. Returns true if the key-value pair in the structure should be included in the filtered struct. Support for passing the original struct to the closure function added in CF11 Update 5.
